resources.string:
City​ ​Bike​ ​lets​ ​you​ ​travel​ ​anywhere​ ​in​ ​the​ ​city​ ​using​ ​CitiBikes​ ​by​ ​showing​ ​you​ ​the​ ​best route​ ​to​ ​swap​ ​bikes​ ​at​ ​stations​ ​along​ ​the​ ​way​ ​to​ ​your​ ​destination.
CitiBike’s​ ​day​ ​and​ ​annual​ ​passes​ ​give​ ​you​ ​unlimited​ ​access​ ​to​ ​their​ ​bikes​ ​all​ ​day​ ​with the​ ​one​ ​drawback​ ​of​ ​either​ ​a​ ​30​ ​or​ ​45​ ​minute​ ​limit​ ​per​ ​session.​ ​However,​ ​it’s​ ​possible​ ​to​ ​return your​ ​bike​ ​to​ ​one​ ​of​ ​their​ ​more​ ​than​ ​a​ ​thousand​ ​stations,​ ​and​ ​immediately​ ​get​ ​on​ ​another​ ​one​ ​and continue​ ​your​ ​journey.
City​ ​Bike​ ​can​ ​show​ ​you​ ​the​ ​best​ ​way​ ​to​ ​your​ ​destination,​ ​even​ ​if​ ​it​ ​is​ ​outside​ ​your​ ​30/45 minute​ ​maximum​ ​time​ ​allotment.​ ​City​ ​Bike​ ​will​ ​give​ ​you​ ​a​ ​route​ ​to​ ​your​ ​destination​ ​that​ ​lets​ ​you bunny​ ​hop​ ​from​ ​one​ ​station​ ​until​ ​the​ ​next,​ ​while​ ​staying​ ​below​ ​the​ ​30/45​ ​minute​ ​limit​ ​per​ ​station.
Type​ ​in​ ​your​ ​destination,​ ​get​ ​on​ ​your​ ​CitiBike​ ​and​ ​start​ ​peddling​ ​without​ ​limitation!

Closest bike racks with the most bikes will be highlighted.
Click on the bikes to see directions, time and distance.

Points of interest are displayed as trees and cups - trees is for parks, cups are for cafes
